title: help me choose
content:
vit vellore cse (fee is 4.5lpa)
mit manipal cse (fee is 5lpa)
bms cse aiml(fee is 2lpa)
pes main campus (fee is 5lpa)
pes ec campus (fee is 1lpa)
i can compromise on college life, placements wise which is the better clg?

comments.body: BMS

Pes ec campus overall seems like the best choice. 

There's a plethora of reasons why say pes>vit (you can see in this in other qs). 

I don't think aiml / any specialisation is the best idea in undergrad esp since you have other / better options

Pes ec campus = rr campus for all intents and purposes (only real difference would be peer group). So since ur getting pes ec through cet I'd say go for it 100%.
what about manipal tho, I'm confused about it
if you can afford it, MIT is better choice . If you feel 5lakhs is too high, pes ec campus is better.The only thing you will missout by choosing ec campus is college life

but like placements wise only, I don't mind college life
(and parents are hesitant for manipal because of the drug culture there)

If money is not a problem take mit

Otherwise ec campus
mit>bms>pes ec

PES EC campus. 

Manipal is the only college on the list which is better than PES, but I don't think the differences are worth 16L.
placements wise which is better tho?

Overall in terms of placements and everything Manipal and PES are more or less the same. Manipal does have more of a campus life if that's important to you. You can still have a lot of fun at pes I feel since it's all down to friend group

AND ofc fees. It depends on how big a factor fees is for you. If you're okay with 5L, then Manipal and PES RR come back into the picture. 

There are some v descriptive answers regarding manipal vs pes in this subreddit which you should go through.
no actually my parents are hesitant for manipal because of the drug culture
placements in rr and ec campus are the same?
placements wise both are equal, but you will have tougher competition in pes due to large amount of people
Mit is overall better. Placements wise, should be similar

Tbh even Manipal main is no better now because it too has multiple CS-allied branches - CS, CS+AIML, CS+DS, DS, IT, CCE etc. Plus last time I heard, the BLR campus will have pooled placements with main campus. I don't think the "lower batch strength" argument will apply when OP will reach final year.
Yes they are the same. You can check the FAQs for a detailed comparison between campuses: [https://bit.ly/pesu-faq](https://bit.ly/pesu-faq)
Placements of both are pooled so it's the same
Yes PES and Manipal MIT are easily at par in academics and placements , just apart from the campus

PES RR > PES EC > MIT Manipal > BMS > VIT vellore

Considering the fees ur getting  
PES EC > PES RR > MIT Manipal > BMS > Vit Vellore
